analysis.description:
Reentrancy in CommonSale.createTokens (/unique_chucks/1/0xe2fb6529ef566a080e6d23de0bd351311087d567.sol#443-469):
	External calls:
	- token.mint(this,tokens) (/unique_chucks/1/0xe2fb6529ef566a080e6d23de0bd351311087d567.sol#455)
	- token.transfer(msg.sender,tokens) (/unique_chucks/1/0xe2fb6529ef566a080e6d23de0bd351311087d567.sol#456)

	- multisigWallet.transfer(msg.value) (/unique_chucks/1/0xe2fb6529ef566a080e6d23de0bd351311087d567.sol#450-451)

	- stages (/unique_chucks/1/0xe2fb6529ef566a080e6d23de0bd351311087d567.sol#469)
	- totalInvested (/unique_chucks/1/0xe2fb6529ef566a080e6d23de0bd351311087d567.sol#461-465)

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/1/0xe2fb6529ef566a080e6d23de0bd351311087d567.sol:
	Contract CovestingToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/1/0xe2fb6529ef566a080e6d23de0bd351311087d567.sol#325-329)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

CommonSale.createTokens (/unique_chucks/1/0xe2fb6529ef566a080e6d23de0bd351311087d567.sol#443-469) does not use the value returned by external calls:

	-token.transfer(msg.sender,tokens) (/unique_chucks/1/0xe2fb6529ef566a080e6d23de0bd351311087d567.sol#456)
